summary: A woman goes to a resort to get married. While she waits for her fiancé to show up, she meets another man.
cast: Arielle Kebbel|Andrew W. Walker|David Haydn-Jones|Colleen Wheeler|Anna Van Hooft|Jaclyn Smith|Daryl Shuttleworth|Matty Finochio|Tony Alcantar|Kurt Max Runte|Kate Dion-Richard|Michael Karl Richards|José Araujo|Winnie Cooper|Denis Corbett|Yolanda Corbett|Laurie Empey|Cortney Ewonus|Trent Pryor|Helen Sharp|Katherine Slingsby|Christian J. Stewart
director: Director: Michael M. Scott (as Michael Scott)
title: Dos novios y una boda
